alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 9:30PM EST until December 22 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River from Elliston to Hazleton. East Fork White River at Seymour. .Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches from Friday night into Saturday caused minor flooding to develop along portions of the White River and the East Fork White River in southern parts of central Indiana. The crest on the White River is near Elliston with points downstream steady to slowly rising. The crest on the East Fork White River is near Seymour with flooding expected to end by late Wednesday. Flooding along the White River is expected to last until Christmas for points downstream of Newberry. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Pasture lands...agricultural lands and several County and State Roads begin to flood. High water isolates a few river cabins. State Road 235 east of Medora and county roads near Shields and Vallonia flood. Roads that begin to flood include 258 east of Cortland...County Road 725 N just north of the gaging site and Ewing Road near Brownstown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Sunday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM EST Sunday was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Monday afternoon by around 1100 AM EST /1030 AM CST/.
